PROJECTS TAKEN.Title of Project: Image Binarization and its Applications in Text Identification
PROJECTS TAKEN.Description:
The goal of this project was to create an expert system that can take pictures of
different kinds as its input and extract the text characters in it using various
machine learning algorithms. Its applications are basically limitless and can be
applied in the fields like Forensics, Identification and Authentication, etc.

The goal of this project was to create a system for the users/customers to make shopping from various available stores in a shopping mall easier by making the checkout counter common for all and also help the storekeepers keep track of their inventory and purchases made by different customers.
The goal was to create an web-based application to process all hospital records and manage them accordingly thus making it available to patients easily for review when needed.

PROJECTS TAKEN.Title of Project: Small-Scale Home Automation using Raspberry Pi
PROJECTS TAKEN.Description: The goal of this project was to automate some everyday activities that we do in our house. It also included the implementation for controlling various home appliances by using mobile devices like Mobile Phones, Tablet PCs, Laptops with the help of a net interface.
